Verify the tab 'Shipping' is initially selected, its border bottom is 3px solid #007BFF, and its text content 'Shipping' has font weight 700
Verify other tabs have border bottom 1px solid #CCCCCC
Verify the accordion section has an offset width of 700px
Verify each accordion item has a box shadow of 0px 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)
Open 'https://www.example.com/' for the first time
Verify the cookie consent banner is visible at the bottom of the viewport, with position bottom 0px, left 0px, and width 100%
Verify the cookie consent banner background color is #333333 and text color #FFFFFF
Verify the banner text 'We use cookies to improve your experience.' has font size 14px
Verify the 'Accept' button has a background color #007BFF, text color #FFFFFF, and border radius 4px
Verify the 'Learn More' link targets 'https://www.example.com/privacy-policy'
Verify the banner has a z-index of 9999 and padding 15px 20px
Click the 'Accept' button on the cookie consent banner
Verify the cookie consent banner disappears and its display becomes 'none'
Verify the transition for hiding the banner is 'opacity 0.5s ease-out'
Open 'https://auth.example.com/login'
Verify the 'Username' input field has an associated label 'Username' with font size 14px and color #333333
Verify the 'Username' input field has a border of 1px solid #CCCCCC and padding 8px 10px
Verify the 'Password' input is of type 'password' and its placeholder text is 'Enter your password'
Verify the 'Login' button is enabled, has a background color #007BFF, text color #FFFFFF, and a min width of 120px
Verify the 'Forgot password?' link has text color #007BFF and targets 'https://auth.example.com/forgot-password'
Verify the login form is centered and has a max width of 400px
Verify the form has a box shadow of 0px 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)
Open 'https://photo.gallery.com/album/nature'
Verify the main image 'forest.jpg' is loaded, has rendered dimensions 800x600px, and its alt text is 'Dense forest with morning fog'
Verify exactly 5 thumbnail images are displayed below, each 100px wide and 75px high, with a 5px border-radius
Verify the active thumbnail has a border of 2px solid #007BFF
Verify the 'Next' arrow button is visible and clickable, having a cursor 'pointer'
Verify the gallery container has a display of 'flex' and a column gap of 10px between thumbnails
Verify the image viewer has a background color #000000 and opacity 0.9
Verify the main image takes less than 1s to load
Verify the main image has object-fit: contain
Open 'https://files.app.com/download'
Initiate a file download
Verify the progress spinner is visible and rotates 360 degrees over 1s
Verify the percentage text '0%' is displayed with font size 24px and color #333333
Verify the progress bar has an initial width of 0px and a background color #007BFF
Verify the 'Cancel Download' button is visible, enabled, and has a background color #DC3545
Verify the progress indicator container is centered horizontally and vertically, with a z-index of 500
Wait 5 seconds
Verify the percentage text updates to '50%' and the progress bar width increases accordingly
Verify the indicator has a box shadow of 0px 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)
Open 'https://www.globalcorp.com/'
Scroll to the bottom of the page
Verify the footer element has a background color #333333 and text color #FFFFFF
Verify the copyright text '© 2024 Global Corp.' is displayed with font size 13px
Verify the 'Privacy Policy' link targets 'https://www.globalcorp.com/privacy' and has text decoration 'none'
Verify the social media icons are visible, each 32px by 32px, and arranged with a column gap of 10px
Verify the 'Contact Us' link has a cursor property of 'pointer' and is located at position (x,y)
Verify the footer has padding 20px 0px and a min height of 100px
Verify the word-break property is break-word for longer text in the footer
Verify the 'Accessibility Statement' link has aria-label 'Read our accessibility statement'
